channel.title: Run and Walk problem
channel.description: When i press run on my server it runs real quick and then it goes back to walk.. how do i fix this? Also when i barrage it doesnt freeze, and does any one have a have a code so mage takes runes?

item.title: Run and Walk problem
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

[quote=“x0 0wn, post:2, topic:180106”]Hold Crtl and click to run.

Or in player.java search for

if (playerEnergy > 0) {thanks if i could rep++

you should see

playerEnergy -= 1; } else { isRunning2 = false; stoprunning = true;

Change isRunning2 to true
and stoprunning to false.

Oh, that’ll make them have unlimited running btw…[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Run and Walk problem
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Hold Crtl and click to run.

Or in player.java search for

				if (playerEnergy > 0) {

you should see

playerEnergy -= 1; } else { isRunning2 = false; stoprunning = true;

Change isRunning2 to true
and stoprunning to false.

Oh, that’ll make them have unlimited running btw…

Read full topic
